items.title: R6mas Holiday Poster Challenge
items.abstract: Join us in celebrating the holidays!
items.content:
# R6Mas Holiday Poster Challenge!
The Holidays are here and everyone is celebrating, even our Siege operators! They want everyone to know and need your help. Your mission, should you so choose, is to create a Holiday themed Siege poster for a chance to win one of 10 Seasonal Weapon Skin Bundles. 

Use whatever medium you’d like whether it be hand-drawn or a digital rendition and share it with us on our Twitter or Instagram using #R6mas and #R6masPosterChallenge and we will pick 10 of our favorites to win. 
As an inspiration, we’ve given an example below. 

![[R6SE]R6masPosterExample](//staticctf.akamaized.net/J3yJr34U2pZ2Ieem48Dwy9uqj5PNUQTn/3iuK4rEE9Y1EdQ0qkY5Oe4/16b977945303752cbbcc0a4e074cde1b/6Mas_Poster_V3.png)

# Giveaway Rules: 
- Contest runs from December 18 – January 1. Winners will be announced on January 8. 
- Create a holiday themed Siege poster and share it using the hashtags #R6mas and #R6masPosterChallenge on either Twitter or Instagram.
- Please add your Twitter/Instagram handle or watermark your work so we can ensure everyone’s submission is unique
- Poster must be new and may not be a direct copy of any other movie poster already existing. 
- Make sure your DMs are open as we will be contacting winners directly through DMs. 

# Prizing
- 10 Total Winners
- Each winner will receive 1 Seasonal Weapon Skins Bundle

# Happy #R6mas
For more details, please see our [official contest rules](http://static2.ubi.com/pxm/RainbowSix/R6%20Poster%20Contest%20Rules%20EN%20FINAL.docx).
